si.title: Ination ාතනය
body_lines: අවුරුදු 31 ක දුරක් එදින (28) උදෑසන මිය ගිය මිනිසා ඊයේ උදෑසන මිය ගියේය.

en.title: Assassination
body_lines: A 31 -year -old man died yesterday morning (28) after being attacked by a sharp weapon.

summary_lines: A 31-year-old man died after being attacked with a sharp weapon yesterday morning.
